name: Marlene

Investigate your estranged sisters remote cottage and surroundings by solving tasks and puzzles to uncover the truth about your niece Marlene's disappearance.

As you approach you notice a figure on the roof of an outhouse...
summary:
Take on the role of Ewan in this supernatural story that immerses you in its world of witchcraft and mystery. Investigate your estranged sisters remote cottage and surroundings by solving tasks and puzzles to uncover the truth about your niece Marlene's disappearance.

Marlene is a VR psychological horror game using room scale and physics interactions to solve tasks and puzzles which progresses a supernatural story in an immersive way.

Enter an interactive story driven game which immerses the player in a realistic world that doesn't use flashing icons, inventory systems or glowing bread trails to break the immersion.
